I bought a 8gb kingston which will give you all the space you need...4000 10MP pics. (Kingston 8 GB SDHC Class 6 Flash Memory Card SD6/8GB).Like with all small cameras the red eye can be an issue.  You can either use the red eye flash which I don't care for, but the camera also has a red eye correction to use after the photo is taken which works great.The video recorder works really well for a camera and with a 8gb sd card you can record as much as you want.My only minor complaint would be the a 3X optical zoom.  Once in a while I find myself wanting a bit more zoom.Overall I highly recommend.  Also, I'm not sure why the black camera is around $60 cheaper than the all silver one.  The black camera looks a lot cooler than the all siver one IMO.  Plus it's nice to be a little different than 95% of the point and shoot cameras out there.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Elph Camera
Reviews.Author: Lesa J. Smith "sasha"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I like that it is small to carry in my purse. It has taken great pictures. I am very happy with it...still checking out some of the features though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Lee
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple and easy to navigate. It has great focus and I really like the canon software that came with the camera.  I suggest purchasing a carrying case.

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot SD770IS 10 MP
Reviews.Author: Jean Horey
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.It takes great pictures, is easy to use, battery life seems good. It's small easy to carry around.I've only had this camera for about 1 month so far so good

Reviews.Title: Great value for a sleek and compact camera
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with good features. I got it as a gold box deal at a great price. If not for the deal I got I probably would have gotten the SD1100.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Hay
Reviews.Content: I use this camra all the time. I love it!!! It is really small. The pictures and videos are great. I take it with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: ellyn
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  It is easy to use and the photosare terrific.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: Bryan Watts
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice. Better than what I thought it was going to be. Cool features built in and very sharp and clear images!

Reviews.Title: Best Point and Shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Redd "QueenBea"
Reviews.Content: I had a 6mp Canon and loved it so I upgraded to the 10mp Canon.This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures. It has so many options built into it that makes taking pictures for any occasion a breeze.You can put it on full auto and take pics at a party or if you're at the beach you can change the settings to accommodate the water and sand.There is also a panorama setting where you can take a series of pictures then stitch them together on your computer after downloading them.It's light weight and small enough to fit in my back pocket so it's easy to get to when I am at my grandson's ball games.It has nice buttons for setting the scene for your pictures. It's not like other models where you have to use your fingernail to select the function.The only drawback is the size of the LCD screen. I wish it was a little bigger. But I do love that the camera has a view finder so if you want to turn off the LCD screen to save on battery you can and still take a picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Cuocco "patricia4203"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, takes great pictures.  The 32G card only holds about 9 photos, but that's because its 10 megapixels.  It's probably more camera than I needed, but it's fabulous.

Reviews.Title: Awesome value
Reviews.Author: L. Varriale "sag_redhead"
Reviews.Content: I relied on the other reviews to decide whether or not I wanted to invest in this product.  Amazon was having a special one day, and I decided to take the plunge.  I'm very grateful I did.  I have an old Canon Elph and have loved it, but I'm going on a dream trip to Italy this fall and wanted to update it.  The improvements they have made over the years and the increase in megapixels are amazing.  Still it retains it's tiny size, convenience and lightness for traipsing all over Europe.  The pictures are amazing.  I can't wait to use it on my trip!

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Lee E. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Much faster second shot delay that our old Nikon Coolpix, very fast first shot.  The menus are a little hard to decipher.

Reviews.Title: SD770IS
Reviews.Author: Donald Southard Jr.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it was a great investment. The quality is amazing from what Ive done with it so far, but i haven't used it enough to write a decent review yet. I did an unboxing of it if you want some decent pictures of it. [...]

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for best price
Reviews.Author: Ratna Paidipamula
Reviews.Content: I need a camera that is easy to use and easy to carry and in my budget. I found this in Amazon and purchased. Amazingly, it serves my purpose more than I expected. It had lot of features we can use very easily.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Atticus F. "Lacey"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for someone else (I already have one) and the recipient was delighted with the size, capabilities, and ease of usage.  I have used my Canon Power Shot camera for over five years and would not consider buying any other kind when the time comes.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying Photography, Again
Reviews.Author: Curtis L. Partridge
Reviews.Content: I had gotten away from taking my old Olympus camera due to size and lower performance. This camera is an absolute joy to carry and use. The image quality is stunning, but it is very small. I have ended up with more high quality images than I have ever have taken.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: B. W. Krogsgard "BWK"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my honeymoon, and it was great.  I had a really old Powershot that I loved, and this one is much much better.  Almost all of the controls are the same, very simple and easy to use, and the quality of pictures is fantastic.For the price of the camera, I could not be much more satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Great Price
Reviews.Author: Lindsey A. Sterner "Lindsey"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace an Olympus that i loved and am not disappointed.  Although I wish it had a few more features it does what i need it to and is nice and tiny. I can use my SLR for the more complex shots...very pleased

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SD770is digital camera
Reviews.Author: "Flyfisher" "Flyfisher"
Reviews.Content: The camera was delivered on time as promised.It takes great pics and I would certainly recommend it.My only wish is that it was waterproof. I'm a fly fisherman and have already dropped one camera in the river.

Reviews.Title: great compact camera!
Reviews.Author: Laura Jones
Reviews.Content: great compact camera that can fit in my pocket! i havent had any issues with this camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Captain Woody "Woody"
Reviews.Content: The last camera that I liked was a Canon.  I tried others because they were cheaper or seemed to have more features but was disappointed.  I had a Pentax that didn't take good picutures and their customer service wasn't into serving the customer.  My Sanyo Xacti stopped working a month after the warrantee ended.I'm back with Canon now.  Great pictures, fast startup, good battery, great features, small.  Thanks Canon, it's good to be home.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Sweet Pea "Sweet Pea"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mom and she loves it.  She likes the lightness of the camera and the longer lasting lithium battery.  She stopped using her previous digital camera because she had to keep changing the AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Photos are better than I expected
Reviews.Author: R. Hammock "RH in CT"
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at how sharp the photos are on this camera.  The detail is superb.  It took me awhile to discover all the setting options, such as one for snow, but once I did my winter shots are the best I've seen.  This camera is worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Portable Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Seal
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera as an anniversary present and to give us more mobility when out and about with pictures.  We have a Canon 30D DSLR and LOVE Canon products, but it was a little cumbersome to bring along.  We took this on a trip to Disneyland and LOVED how portable it was.Takes great pictures, is fast and responsive (for a compact, not as fast as a DSLR), the screen is bright, and videos are surprisingly good.  No complaints.  For the price we paid ($144 on a gold box special) this was a GREAT buy.No "cons" or complaints.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Really good product! I would recommend this camera to anybody who wants a high quality camera at a reasonable price.I like the optical viewfinder which is very helpful when you film outdoor, under bright sunshine.Amazon service is awesome too.

Reviews.Title: Really Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: E. Tryk
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace my older Canon, which was starting to show signs of old age.  I was thrilled with this PowerShot...it takes FANTASTIC pictures.  I use it sometimes to photograph my ceramic art and it honestly made one of the bowls look better than it actually does in person!  It is very easy to use...easy transition from sepia/black and white/color - unlike previous versions.  It has been a wonderful camera and I will most definitely get my use out of it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Joseph S. Henry
Reviews.Content: I actually had wanted one of the more expensive canon 10 MP point-and-shoot cameras, but this one was in a much more affordable price range.  It has surpassed all of my expectations - it takes amazingly crisp pictures, it is very compact, and it still has a manual viewfinder. This can be very handy when taking shots of bright objects (scenery with the sun in it), because digital screens will show lines and bright spots that won't show up in your final exposure.The camera has an accelerometer like the higher end models, so it will flip he image sideways as you turn the camera sideways, and fill the screen.I've taken side-by-side pictures with my girlfriend, who is using a top-of-the-line sony cybershot.  My images come out with truer color and more clarity every time.  It has a higher resolution screen, better zoom, more modes, and better battery life.  It's also more compact, and more intuitive to zoom and control.If you are looking for a great new point-and-shoot camera, I can assure that you will not be disappointed.  It has all of the features you could want, and has a bunch of different modes for night shots and so forth.  I am perfectly content with it, and wouldn't trade it for any other camera I have seen or used.

Reviews.Title: Perfectly Portable
Reviews.Author: Faye
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good camera that you can always have around that takes good shots, look no further.  It is hard to beat the size/price/performance of this Powershot.This camera easily fits into my purse or jacket (and even can be slipped into jean pockets)  Takes very good photos with not much thought, perfect for capturing moments quickly. Definate worthwhile purchase to have even if you have other bigger cameras

Reviews.Title: Canon's best small digital camera-Best price found at Amazon-Great product
Reviews.Author: Andrew G. Fisher
Reviews.Content: This has to be the best small size digital camera that Canon makes. Going from a Canon Power Shot A-60 to this is a big change. My A-60 was starting to have problems with a flickering screen and then I dropped it and that jammed the switch for tele/wide angle. I purchased this camera through Amazon with a spare battery and a larger memory card. Amazon had the lowest price of any camera distributer I could find. I'm using this for normal around the house picture's, traveling, and eBay. Much sharper, and clearer pictures then the old A-60. Nice 10mp pictures make the difference. Fits perfectly in a pocket that you forget that you even have it on you. I have had it for over a month now, and have really enjoyed using it. I have not tried every feature, but I am looking at trying them all. There is a difference in price between the all silver camera and the two tone black/silver. Everything the same on them, so I don't know why the price difference. I opted for the two tone and saved a few dollars. Canon is way in front of the competition when it comes to camera's. The software that comes with the camera is very good too. I don't have any Photoshop type software to compare that with, but it does meet basic needs for downloading pictures, croping, etc...I'm a fan for life!

Reviews.Title: The Canon Experience
Reviews.Author: David B. Merrilees
Reviews.Content: With this little beauty, along with my Rebel XSi EOS 450D, needing a quicky or a studio photo suitable for framing, my photographic need are met beyond par. My best came over, boasting about his 15.5mp Rebel, and I defied him to take a more concise image; I haven't seen it yet!But the 770 is as clear as my XSi on point and shoot.I think Consumer Report had the Canons on top of their lists, as well!

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great product.  I don't know about the price (better here then anywhere else I found it) but it sure does what it's suppose to do.  The picture quality is pretty good and the different parts of the camera is decently sturdy.  Have had bad experiences with other cameras that fall apart on me because of bad engineering of the parts such as the zoom feature, the button used for taking the picture and the lens.  I like this product overall.

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Bargain Shopper
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and I researched several before choosing the SD770IS. It is everything I hoped for and more. Easy to operate, yet professional enough to satisfy my requirements. Picture quality is top notch. The display is large for easy viewing which was one of my issues for other cameras. Am happy with my choice and would highly recommend this camera for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Ok, so far
Reviews.Author: Not so Tech Savvy
Reviews.Content: The camera is relatively easy to use.  The quality looks good.  It is lightweight.  My only warning (and perhaps I am the only one that did not understand)is that the memory chip provided with the camera was not large enough to hold more than 6 shots.  The quick start directions don't show you how to check the pixel size, nor is it even suggested that you go out and buy a new memory card - pronto. So when Obama walked by me and I wiped out my new camera all I got was "memory almost full":(....

Reviews.Title: Me, not It
Reviews.Author: A's Mom
Reviews.Content: The cropping on digital cameras is tricky for me to figure out.  Different image quality yields different shaped photos (apparently).  A Kodak camera I returned showed a modified LCD screen based on at what the image quality one set.  Unfortunately the picture quality was poor on that camera -- couldn't touch this.  Anyway, many of my Disney World photos were annoying chopped off at the top, despite my belief that the camera was set to take pictures of the appropriate proportion.  That stuff, i'm sure, is mostly human error, though perhaps there is a level of expertise in using the camera I hadn't relied on.  The only more objective complaint was that my lithium battery went dead the second I got to Nassau, despite my having charged it fully the evening before.  Fortunately that only happened once.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: P. D. Peters
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for a senior citizen.  Easy to use and understand.  Excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: Im a point and shoot beginner...but do know what a clean crisp picture should look like on a digital camera..and so far this camera delivers.Colors come out well..the camera is a good size..has a sturdy feel and has just about everything one would need in order to take a good picture as their are alot of options which allow you to take the kind of picture you need in any particular siituation. For me an overall good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great, unless you get the lens error issue
Reviews.Author: Makakio "Maka"
Reviews.Content: I've had four Elphs total.  All were great except for the last one, which worked great with two major exceptions: SD1000 that developed the "lens error" problem.  Canon fixed it once under warranty. Once out of warranty it happened again about 9 months later (they warranty their warranty repairs for 60 days).  No dice.  It's now sitting in a drawer and will probably become my three-year-old's toy.Why did I buy a fourth Powershot?  Because we're completely accustomed to every control and feature - and when they work they work brilliantly.If I get the same error with this unit we're done.  So far so good - crisper images with good focus, even smaller body (!), substantial feel, good LCD (if a little smaller than the cameras w/no viewfinder) and very quick on power-up.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SD770 IS Camera
Reviews.Author: N. Reid "dj conundrum"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is an awesome deal, paid $160 for it new. Has many manual edits that reminds me of my old SLR. At 3.75x2.25x3.5 inches it easily fits in your pocket. Real fast start time. It has great white balance (even custom for nice color effects)and if pushed to iso 1600 it has a nice grain. I am able to take most pictures without a flash and use natural light only, it helps that there is an image stabalizer. Zoom and macro are incredible, and it does well with night painting photos. Highly recommend unless you want to blow a few thousand on a real camera.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: J. Allred
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera two or three months.  I have no complaints.  It starts up really fast.  It is ready to take pictures two seconds after pressing the "On" button.  Colors are rendered accurately.  The image stabilizer works.  This camera really is the size of a deck of cards.  Mine is made in Japan and has excellent buid quality.  I have the siver and black one.  It looks much better in person than the silver one.I am very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: For the size and weight this camera does it all.  I put it in my purse so that it is always with me.  I never miss a good shot.  I always know where it is and it is so easy to use.  I have only started to find all the fun and creative things you can do.  I have been a loyal Canon fan for years and this camera lives up to my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Best point & shoot camera I've ever had.
Reviews.Author: Yoyo
Reviews.Content: Yeah, that's right!, the best I've ever had.  I own a Canon Rebel xti and I was needing a smaller one with the same amount of pixels to snap a picture wherever I go if I need to.  I've always trusted Canon cameras because of their resolution and I've had the chance to compare them with other brands.  Canon's resolution has always satisfied me and this one wasn't different.  Top brands to me are Canon and Nikon, but even the latter, being in the market for a long time and known almost as the mother of all existent cameras, hasn't quite accomplished a good resolution yet, digitally speaking.I'm giving it 4 stars, because of the macro function.  It's a little limited on that part, compared to other cameras I've had.Overall this camera is beyond my expectations, is almost like having my SLR and I'm really satisfied with it.Take it from me, I have a bachelor's degree in journalism and I've been handling cameras for some time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the pocket!
Reviews.Author: Allen Sutton
Reviews.Content: Many years ago, I had a Canon S410 that I absolutely loved until I accidentally left it in a bag in my car in the summer.  After that, I purchased a Nikon CoolPix and was disappointed with its inability to quickly focus and take a clear picture.  Having a toddler, seconds can seem like ages when trying to catch them doing something that you'll probably embarass them with in their teen years.  I ditched the CoolPix and purchased this Canon product and have never regretted the decision.This camera quickly focuses on its subject and has decent face recognition.  Its red eye reduction is top notch.  Surprisingly, it takes pretty good movies at 640x480 as well.  It's nothing I would burn on a DVD and bore people with at family gatherings, but it's something I don't mind using to capture my baby saying her first few words.My only complaint is the flash.  It struggles to light up anything farther away than 5 feet.  I guess it is to be expected from a camera that is at home in my pocket, but it is disappointing to not be able to use it in larger rooms.  It wouldn't prohibit me from buying this again, nor would it prohibit me from strongly recommending this product to anybody looking for a point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect point and shoot
Reviews.Author: ckdesign
Reviews.Content: I love the size and physical design of this camera. A lot of the other Canons have odd shapes and are definitely not as sleek as this one. As far as functionality, I think it has more than enough features to take a decent shot in any environment. The one thing they should have changed is their ISO setting. You can only switch from normal to HI...I'd prefer to be able to change from 100 to 400 or 1600. Overall a great camera for the price!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: PhotoGirl "Meghan"
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of the Canon Powershot cameras-I had an older model for about 4 years and it suddenly died.  The camera takes great photos and provides you with a fairly large size image for printing.  Overall, this camera has been great.  The one thing that I don't like on this particular model is the cover to the battery-it's a bit flimzy and is not on a spring.  The past model I had was much sturdier and had a spring on it.

Reviews.Title: The Optical Image Stabilizer was worth the price alone
Reviews.Author: J. H. Goldman "LOOK595"
Reviews.Content: This is my third generation of PowerShot and replaced a 6MP Canon SD630.  I was happy with the SD630, but upgraded to get the Optical Image Stabilizer and it was worth it.  It fixed the only issue I had with my SD630 which was blurry in door pictures with no flash (even with photo lights and in a photo tent).  I use that mode a lot for shooting items to go on ebay. I chose the SD770 0ver other models due to its size and low Amazon price.  I had to give up the SD630's 3" LCD for the SD770's 2.5" LCD, but gained a range finders and smaller size.

Reviews.Title: Small package, large results
Reviews.Author: M. Allen
Reviews.Content: Based on the raving reviews here, I bought this camera in December. At first I was shocked at how small it is. I have an old Canon PowerShot that finally gave up the ghost last year and it's larger, heavier, noisier. The SD770 is tiny by comparison, light as a feather and very quiet.The proof of any camera's greatness is the quality of its photos. The SD770 produces super photos. I haven't taken the time to learn all its fun features yet, but I took some low-light photos at Christmas with the family and they turned out great.This was on sale in December for approx. $160, and for my money, you can't beat it. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Jamal
Reviews.Content: Its a very nice camera, i got it as a gift for someone and overall they are very satisfied. It's light weight, has a very nice design and feel to it. the camera quality is great especially in the review in the camera LCD. Somethings it takes some fiddling around with the setting to achieve optimal performance. i previously owned a Sony cybershot 7.2 MP. having used both of the the powershot , in my opinion, easily out performs the cybershot. the battery life is great for us, but we don't take pictures every second of the day but we take a lot when we do. Also the software on it is very quick, starts up n less the 1/2 second i would estimate. Overall its a great camera, i have had no faults with t thus far.

Reviews.Title: another winner
Reviews.Author: D. Roberts "anoldhippy"
Reviews.Content: Fast, small, image stabilization, face recognition, lots of extras for a point and shoot. Another winner in the Elf format. Only drawback is the limited 3X optical zoom. Great camera for the money. I started with theSD230, then the SD630 and then this SD770. A really nice camera in the progression.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot SD770
Reviews.Author: Bruce Pedersen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife, however I am the one who has to figure out how to use it. I must say the camera can do much more than I will ever use or remember. The instruction booklet is very well illustrated and easy to use. I did not realize how much of a difference 10mp would make over my 3mp until I was able to view them side by side, WOW!!! I have purchased many items from Amazon and have never been disappointed with the products or delivery. Always is what they say it is and always delivered on or before the scheduled date.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with upgrade
Reviews.Author: Jes "Jes"
Reviews.Content: I had a Canon Powershot SD450 for 3 years until it's untimely contact with the floor. After reading a lot of reviews, I decided on the 770 and so far have been very happy with the performance. The menus are very similar to what I was used to, with several improvements where they were needed. The color options, including "vibrant" produced great photos on my recent trip to Ireland.I'm a big fan of the new tool that finds and prevents faces from getting too blown out with the flash. My only complaint, however, is that when shooting (people or landscapes) the camera has a hard time balancing the lighting between the ground and sky. In Ireland, I'd either great beautiful green grass with a white, blown out sky, or dark foreground with the intense blue sky. Has anyone found a setting to remedy this problem?!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for Amateurs, Too
Reviews.Author: chertheatr
Reviews.Content: As first-time parents, my husband and I have been taking photos pretty much nonstop for the last fifteen months. Our old camera was great at first but quickly became only adequate when our baby became a toddler. The Canon PowerShot really does track movement and capture great photos, especially for those of us amateur photographers trying to capture running toddler photos.The screen on the back is nicely sized, and the menus and controls are extremely intuitive. I was able to use the camera several times before picking up the super-thick manual to learn about other great features I wasn't using. The only caveat is that the charger is the kind that sticks directly to the outlet instead of having a cord, so it takes up wall space instead of fitting in my charging station.All in all, a fantastic buy. Definitely recommended for other on-the-go types who want the camera to worry about making every picture beautiful for them.

Reviews.Title: SD770 is a great camera
Reviews.Author: Robert T. Wilson "Tech Junkie"
Reviews.Content: If you're not looking for 'over the top' pictures like that which you would get with an SLR, this is a wonderful Point and Shoot camera.  Also, CHDK is currently a work-in-progress for this camera which will open the door for many new features including RAW capture, bracketing, and enhanced video controls to name a few.  I bought this camera on Black Friday and got a GREAT deal on it, and I couldn't be happier with it. I recently drove across the country with it and a 4GB memory card and never had to clear it one time and I used it A LOT!

Reviews.Title: So glad I bought it!
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: I am not aiming this review at the technically advanced people.  You people already know whether or not to buy this camera.  This review is for the average person who is looking for a good deal on a good camera.  If you are like me you want some value for your money...well this is it!  I researched several cameras on various sites, read all the reviews & even went to a few stores to see the actual cameras.  The Canon Powershot SD770IS is the one I ended up buying.  I love it!  I have no regrets buying it.  It's very easy to use & the directions are not at all hard to follow.  It's a snap to transfer pictures from the camera to the computer & it doesn't take long at all...even the first time.I ended up buying a battery charger because it didn't show as coming w/the camera, but it does.  So now I have a spare.  I would also buy a bigger memory card, because the 32 byte one that comes w/it will fill up real fast.  I bought one that came w/a free USB Reader.I can't recommend this camera enough to those that are not really sure what they want.  Again, very easy to use & learn to do some fun things w/it.4/14/11Over two years later & I still love this camera!  I carry it with me daily & use it all the time.  Even after all this time, it still takes pictures as great as it did on day one!  No complaints.  Not a one.  Definitely glad I bought it.  I've been thinking about getting the newer version...but I might wait it out & see how long this one lasts.  Definitely going to buy Canon again.  Great quality!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for taking day-to-day photos, not so great for videos
Reviews.Author: Annie Lai-tallapragada "Annie L."
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that would take good photos without flash in dim-light, and has a large viewscreen, and this camera definitely satisfied both of those requirements.  It takes excellent photos, it has a really fast start-up, and there is no delay between the time you press the button to when it takes a photo (unlike some other digital cameras I've had before).  The only bad thing is that when you are taking a video and you zoom in, the image gets all pixelated and there is major loss of details.  So if you take a lot of videos with your digital camera and that is a major requirement for you, I wouldn't recommend this camera.  But other than that I do like this camera, it has lots of the basic features that you will need to tweak your photos, it has a lot of ISO options when you put the camera in "Manual", and I love the slideshow feature that scrolls thru both photos and videos!

Reviews.Title: Love Canon - and this camera lives up to high expectations
Reviews.Author: A. Robbins
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use, takes great pictures and I absolutely love it!  Especially for the great deal that I got from AMAZON!!!  Thanks, Amazon!Angel

Reviews.Title: My Girlfriend Loved It
Reviews.Author: James Figueroa "Amazonhead"
Reviews.Content: Great Product! Made a great Christmas present. My Girlfriend loves it. Great deal for a 10 mp camera. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Uhler
Reviews.Content: Awesome little piece of technology. Very easy to use and takes excellent quality pictures. Best camera I've ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Love my cannon powershot
Reviews.Author: Brett R. Johnston
Reviews.Content: I love it! It is small and can easily be put in a purse or bag but has so many features and the pictures are incredible.  I highly suggest this camera and it was a great price!

Reviews.Title: great camera great price
Reviews.Author: Robert O. Kensler III "robert"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a huge upgrade from my last camera a 5 plus year old nikkon. this camera takes great pictures just make sure you are smart enough to order a memory card for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Forti
Reviews.Content: I have had many cameras over the years, and have had one digital camera, a Canon, I have had it for 2 years and love the brand. It came time to get my two daughters good cameras as they get ready to go off to college as Christmas gifts and searched for weeks reading about all types of digital cameras. Wanting to get them both a really nice camera with lots of options but not in the $300 range. This camera is absolutely fabulous. If I were ready for an upgrade I would get one for myself. You can do so many things with this camera I don't see any negative things about this camera and I am a huge picture freak. Not once have they run out of their batteries, and come these are 17 year olds taking pictures of anything...I would recommend this camera to anyone. I got it at a great price during Christmas from Amazon regularly a $229 camera and I got it for $159. Better than any other deal I found out there.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Salamanca "band mom"
Reviews.Content: My normal camera is a Canon 30D but I needed something much smaller and streamlined to take on a trip to Europe. It was quite user-friendly and I found myself only checking the manual once for something obscure.Overall, it is a good quality camera that I would recommend.  The accompanying software for uploading images is ZoomBrowser and that is another user-friendly program.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: James M. Goldstein "Deal lover"
Reviews.Content: The canon Elph's just keep getting better.  This camera is slick, lightweight and goof proof.  It takes beautiful pictures and the controls are ergonomically accessible and intuitive. Shutter lag time when using the flash is a little longer than I would have hoped but I may not be using the auto-focus feature correctly. One great feature is the optical viewfinder which allows for steadier picture taking and the turning off of the LCD display to save battery life. Many of the Elphs have cut this feature which eliminated them from my consideration. The videos are terrific and the wide angle/telephoto switch operates during the filming. More expensive models have one great feature that this model doesn't have--a wide angle lens for panoramic shots.  Short of that, this model is a tremendous value.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Millie's Mom
Reviews.Content: Love the camera so far.  Easy to use and a lot smaller than my previous camera.  I used to get a lot of blurry pictures.  I think the image stabilizer is helping me.

Reviews.Title: good!
Reviews.Author: Greidi A. Cruz "gerylove"
Reviews.Content: very good device, fast and easy to manage, the picture resolution is good, the camar small and light.very good!

Reviews.Title: Lew from NJ
Reviews.Author: L. Annucci
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my wife as a Christmas present.  She absolutely loves it.  She now downloads all the pictures to our home computer with the software and USB connector included in the box.  The pictures are sharp and the battery life is longer then my SD600 camera.  I would highly recommend the SD770.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: C L Jake "C L Jake"
Reviews.Content: Got it to replace an older Sony. Lots of features I'm still learning.  Takes really great pictures without flash, red eye correction is nice for kids pictures.  Kid setting is great for toddlers. Battery charges fast. Download to computer is fast once I learned the software. Is nice compact size. 12X zoom is fun to play with. Pictures turn out pretty decent once I caught on how to hold the camera and what settings I needed to use. Only feature I haven't figured out and it may not be there is my old Sony let me move the picture and resave it, I haven't been able to do that with this Canon. Only drawback is there are so many features that I have to keep the instruction book handy. Otherwise worth the  $.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera, and needless to say my family and friends love it too. My sisters have two different Nikon cool pix cameras and my mom has a sony. This camera by far comes out with the best pictures, and a little tweaking in Photoshop makes them perfect. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone because it is also pretty easy to figure out :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: S. Harding
Reviews.Content: This is such a good camera for the price.  I had to order some extra memory, but the camera itself is worth it, for sure.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Villanueva
Reviews.Content: So far it has been a great little point and shoot camera with enough functions to customize a shot but still be easy enough for an amateur. Overall I would recommend it to anyone needing a point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Beyond our expectations!
Reviews.Author: L. Burou
Reviews.Content: A photogorapher for 45 years, I've taken a lot of pictures.  For the first time, I'm comfortable with a tiny camera in my pocket, confident it will automatically do a good job in any reasonable lighting condition.No excuses, it takes great pictures just as our two Cannon Sure Shots did 25 years ago!  This camera provides Waaaay more flexibility than I'm interested in using in my old age.For Christmas, we took some snap shots and hooked it up to the TV and enjoyed a slide show for the first time...Priceless to  watch the grand kids on that day!Great color balance, automatic focus, flash, and on and on go the features we use every time we turn it on.  I bought the camera for its larger LCD so my good wife (with poor vision) can see to use it, that is a big thing for us.No regrets, its a keeper.  :)

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SD770
Reviews.Author: S. Boyer "SandieB"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Camera as a Christmas Gift for my Daughter.Small, lightweight and easy to use, she loves it!I love the fact that I get more photos of my Grandsons!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: E. Gjylameti "Ermal3k"
Reviews.Content: I have have been using the camera for over a month mostly in closed places like clubs. Over 95% of the pictures come out very good. The only thing I have against this camera is the red eye. Even though it is set to fix it it self it doesn't. I have to manually change it myself.

Reviews.Title: canon review
Reviews.Author: Shimmster
Reviews.Content: very satisfied with the product...just wish there was a way to manually turn the flash on...only settings it has is off and auto.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Vic Denny
Reviews.Content: This product came as if you picked it off the shelf yourself, a great value and prompt delivery. The camera itself is a great point and shoot pocketable device.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Spatial K
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband for Christmas.  He really loves it!  It is user friendly and the software that came with it is awesome.  The choice of modes when taking a picture are numerous and varied so it is really hard to take a bad photo.  It's also really easy to take along because of it's size.  I recommend you purchase a case because it could easily fall out of a pocket.  My husband got a nice one at Wal-Mart for $10.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Small, reliable and easy to use - just what my wife wanted.
Reviews.Author: J. Wrede
Reviews.Content: I gave my wife this camera for Christmas.  She had been complaining for months that her old digital camera (5 years old) was flaky, unreliable and impossible to take anywhere due to its size.This camera has made her a very happy lady.  It's small but still has a good sturdy feel.  It takes great point-and-shoot photos and impromptu videos.  Especially handy for her is the feature that locates faces and makes sure they're in focus.  Best of all, the battery life is quite good (especially compared to what she was used to) even with the flash.

Reviews.Title: Value for Money
Reviews.Author: Addy
Reviews.Content: I bought this product from amazon for Thanksgiving. I see no problems. I suggest this for someone who's looking for a camera at decent price.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot pocket digital camera
Reviews.Author: Sam Heartland "Mystery Buff"
Reviews.Content: The Canon PowerShot SD770 IS Camera fits in your pocket, takes a great photo with excellent clarity. The manual is easy to follow. A great product. Purchase a memory card as the camera's memory card only holds 11 photos

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Hirschheim
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.....no doubt about it. Pictures are fantastic, even in relative low light. Easy to use, good battery life, good quality workmanship. This camera is a winner!

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: S. Janes
Reviews.Content: The Canon SD770IS delivers as advertised and for the price can't be beat. It takes a while to learn all the features but well worth time. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Davey "Sam"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my technology retarded parents and even they could figure it out!  The camera has lots of different features which are all very easy to use.  The pictures come out crisp and clear.  I ordered this camera after reading tons of great reviews on it, and I'm happy to report that they were all correct!  Amazon had the best price on this camera by far!  Best Buy wanted almost $70 more!  And Amazon through in a Kingston 4GB memory card for free!Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: A great little camera
Reviews.Author: K. Brooksby "der Eroberer"
Reviews.Content: I am no expert photographer, but I have been taking pictures for more than 40 years. This is a great little camera. Easy to use, light weight, and very easy to transfer pictures. The only thing I dislike about it is the teeny viewfinder. I mean, who uses the viewfinder anymore, with a big, clear display of what the picture will be? I think it must have been included because there are still some who think cameras need viewfinders. These are the same people who think their digital cameras should make a clicking shutter sound.To anyone who wants a simple, easy to use camera that takes really great quality pictures and does not need all the accessories of a SLR type camera, I recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: Canon 770
Reviews.Author: R. R. S.
Reviews.Content: Fantastic camera at a great price. I am very pleased with it. The photo's it produces are great

Reviews.Title: My first Camera
Reviews.Author: Mitesh Sura
Reviews.Content: I always wanted to good camera, this one is just gr8, I liked its features like image stabilization, shutter speed, zoom, good for amutuer photographers ..

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Francesca
Reviews.Content: Oh how I adore my new canon powershot! I am a huge canon fan - way more so over Nikon and this camera just fed the fire. I own several old film cameras and a canon XT. I just simply didn't want to cart around the XT to parties, small gathering etc which is why I bought this wonderful point and shoot- the features and quality is great. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Close to perfect powershot
Reviews.Author: CaliLuv
Reviews.Content: After reading a various amount of reviews for the different 10MP - this was a great choice.  Point and click!  Love it.  I started taking pictures without any additional set up and the pictures have come out VERY clear and colors are vivid.  This is not pocket slender, but close.  I give this 4 of 5 stars only because I wished the optical zoom was better than 3x.  Otherwise, a great find/buy!

Reviews.Title: so easy
Reviews.Author: Ana Montes De Oca "lipgloss junkie"
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use. I'm not too savvy with electronics so this camera is perfect for me

Reviews.Title: good photos, easy to use
Reviews.Author: H. Salomon "H. Salomon"
Reviews.Content: I've always used an SLR camera.  This camera is very easy to use and takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: L. Jensen
Reviews.Content: This is the second PowerShot I've had, the first being the SD1000. I loved that first camera into the ground so I got this one as an upgrade. While there are a few tweaks, it's pretty much the same camera and that's all I really wanted.The only thing I dislike about this camera is that you can't turn the flash down. :: Edit :: After taking some time and figuring the camera out, it turns out that through the manual setting you can take really great indoor pictures, so there's really nothing bad about the camera!For the price it's a great digital camera that you can take with you everywhere.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: retired nurse "Carole"
Reviews.Content: Perfect little camera for travel.  Fits in my purse and is lightweight.  Holds a card that will takes over 700 pictures.

Reviews.Title: great camera overall
Reviews.Author: Yun Teng "micactus"
Reviews.Content: it's affordable, portable and takes nice pics. I took it during the Xmas trip to Vegas, Zion, Bryce Canyon, Lake Powell (antelope canyon), and Grand Canyon and was satisfied mostly with the pics taken. There are quite some customizations for you to play with. Performance in low light (antelope canyon) can be improved. I also wish there were more shooting modes for me to choose from. I used to use a Nikon coolpix, which has a lot of options.

Reviews.Title: IMPRESSIVE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: AM "Anne"
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera for a month, but I'm very happy with it.  I was replacing a Kodak EasyShare Z700 that I lost.  I was never satisfied with the Kodak's indoor flash.  Most every picture taken indoors that required a flash was overexposed, even if you manually adjusted it.  Outdoor pictures and all other features on the Kodak were great.With that in mind, indoor picture quality was my concern.  I am very impressed with the Canon Elph's flash.  You can take a picture with the flash into a dark hallway and everything is perfectly illuminated without being overexposed.  I also LOVE the pocket size of this camera!  This is a perfect camera for me as a mom with a active family.

Reviews.Title: Good Point and Shoot Camera, No Raw, No Bracketing
Reviews.Author: sira "Chandoo"
Reviews.Content: This is fantastic point and shoot camera,In my first shipment battery and wrist strap were missing, Amazon send a quick replacement. I appreciate their customer service, This makes me buy more things on Amazon.Camera is awesome, video is great without any lag, Photos were crisp and clear, I felt picture is little burr with superfine setting, i am fine with "Fine setting".No Raw shooting and bracketing, i felt these should be mandatory on all the camera's( Canon At least), those who don't understand these no need to worry. I hope canon will release the firmware for these settings.Over all this is Best point and shoot camera for $159.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with the purchase overall
Reviews.Author: Sicheng Chen
Reviews.Content: SD770 matches my expection. Slim, sliver, light enough to put inside of pocket. The image quality is good, easy to use. One thing that I don't like is that it's not good to take picture of moving kids, especially inside the door; couldn't compete with my canon SLR EOS. But it's very good for my wife.

Reviews.Title: perfect size and weight
Reviews.Author: Christi Valley
Reviews.Content: This camera, though not as slim as its close Nikon and Olympus competitors, features all the great Canon features in a slightly more compact frame.  My daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: fantastic point and shoot for quality/price
Reviews.Author: D. Body "DRB"
Reviews.Content: I checked out all the point and shoots in the stores...and for quality/price, I love this camera.  I have a Nikon D90 but I needed something to fit in my purse.  Of course, you can't compare quality w/ a D90 but this does a fantastic job with lots of fun little perks too, like 'color accent', 'digital macro', and a little editing thrown in the camera.  The best is I got this on sale, Black Friday Deal, through Amazon, so it made the deal oh, so sweeter...I ended up getting one for my sister too...I've had it about a month and half so it's not just our of the box reaction.  The size (small) does take some getting used to, but use the strap to stay safe et viola...

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: BKing "BKing"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little point and shoot camera. Fits in your pocket, takes great photos, easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Click and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: N. Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use when I didn't want to lug around my compact SLR.  The CSLR is 4MP but the Canon 10MP pictures are actually much better.  I definitely recommend this camera especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: excelent item, the best price, good quality, its very smooth
Reviews.Author: E. navarrete "Doctor"
Reviews.Content: i had bad experience with the mailing due never came the first time however i had receive the best customer service ever!!!the camera is fantastic & Amazon too!!

Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: C. Wray "Dresen"
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the abilities and clarity of the picture for the price.  Love the size and the zoom!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kristi L. Manninen "Kristi Manninen"
Reviews.Content: This camera is super easy to use, produces great pictures, & let's face it is just cute, being as small as it is.

Reviews.Title: Wish the offer will come again
Reviews.Author: Francis Lai
Reviews.Content: It was a very attractive offer, and I bought 2 units..now I want one one of the same model and offer but am still waiting for a repeat deal...sigh.........

Reviews.Title: Descent small digital camera
Reviews.Author: Mr. Liang Xu "Leo X"
Reviews.Content: bought it as a gift for my wife. We love it. Very handy and stylish. Not the best picture quality esp on low light. But it meets all our requirement.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but not the best
Reviews.Author: K. Mir
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the amazing deal Amazon had which included a free 4GB memory card for a total of $160 including free shipping.The camera is good but in low light situations, even outdoors the images have a lot of noise, more than Sony's I feel. The lens isn't the best as it causes purple fringing, but for its price you cant beat the fact that this is a 10 mega pixel Point and shoot. Enlarging images to the actual 10 mega pixel resolution causes them to lose a lot of quality, the large CCD size allows a little give in enlarging images but not a lot without a loss of quality.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Piece of Equipment
Reviews.Author: Justin Merrill "legendarysim"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for myself the day after Thanksgiving due to the fact the camera was powerful and yet extremely affordable.The pictures that the camera takes are crisp and clean and I've yet to run into any problems where the pictures have come out 'blurry.'I also like how Canon added all the accessories required for this camera. With my previous camera I had to buy my own USB Cable and AV Cable.The camera is pretty small which is good for most but if you have big hands like I do you may end up dropping it one to many times. It will fit into your jean pockets comfortably.Although the camera takes good pictures by itself I wish there were more detailed options when it comes to taking pictures (example: set shutter speed, set ISO).

Reviews.Title: A little nice camera
Reviews.Author: sonatainp
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot. With this price, it performs better than I expected. Small and powerful. Image quality is great. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: The Best Bang for my Buck
Reviews.Author: D. K. Huynh
Reviews.Content: Is it this... or the SD1110 IS? Hmmm. It has to be this.Smaller, heavier (in a good way), and packing more juicethan ever. I was very happy with this. I like the facetracking, hella slickness. I like this Canon better thanmy old camera the Sony T1 something.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Laura Farinas "ThyNocturne"
Reviews.Content: This is the first digital camera I have bought for myself, all of my others have been less than 4MP and not my choice. I chose this camera because of it's price, size, and picture quality. I'm not even close to being a professional photographer, but I have been wanting to get more into it and needed at least 10MP to take the pictures I wanted to.Pros: A decent range of menu and function options, excellent resolution on pictures, lightweight & compact (fits in my pocket). When I started to browse the options in the main and function menus, I was a little overwhelmed because none of my other cameras had so many settings. I HIGHLY recommend reading the user manual, it answered all of my technical questions regarding this camera. Once you know how to change the settings to fit your environment, this little camera takes beautiful pictures, especially in digital macro mode, which I've always had trouble with on other cameras. The image stabilization is good, too. Only a few of my digital macro pictures have come out blurry, because I was not using a hard surface or tripod. The camera lets you know when it is "shaking" too much, which I find to be rather helpful. Another thing I particularly like (which is probably pretty common with more recent cameras I'm sure) is face detection.Cons: The little cover for the cable to connect the camera to the computer is a little annoying, it kind of gets in the way while you're plugging in the cable.. Also, the cord doesn't go in very well, I had to push a little harder than I'd like with a piece of equipment. I'm worried about this breaking before its time.It may have just been my computer, who knows, but when I loaded the software that came with the camera I chose to manually install because I didn't want the image viewer it came with (I like to use Preview on my Mac). When I tried to transfer the images to my computer though, it didn't work. I went back and installed the image viewer and voila, no problem. Seeing as how it was separate from the other two items to install, I assumed I could live without it, but apparently not and I really didn't want to add 300MB worth of something I didn't even want to my computer.Overall, this is a cool camera and I'm definitely happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Warren E. Cortesi
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a very well built camera (better than the SD1100 a friend has) that does everything quite well in my limited experience with it. It's amazing that it cost me less than half what my 4 year old Canon A95 did, and has twice the resolution and is less than half the size!

Reviews.Title: Nice and Cool. Black one is better
Reviews.Author: Shawn S "Shawn"
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is nice and cool, fits very well in my jean's pocket. The quality of picture is also good.I placed an order on a silver one, but a little surprisingly a black one came. Anyway I now think the black one may be better then the silver one. The black circle in the front looks nice and cool, the texture of the black circle is not cheap plastic staff, shining metallic. And as someone said before, the string came with the black one is also black, which won't end up with a dirty color as the silver one does.

Reviews.Title: canon 770
Reviews.Author: reddot31 "reddot31"
Reviews.Content: great camera.im really impressed with the zoom. it also takes great pictures at night even if your not a professional. the size makes it easy to store in your pocket. im having a great time shooting pictures with my new camera. i had the sony cybershot before this camera and i think the canon blows my sony out of the water. soon i will purchase the marine case for my canon 770 so that i can take it with me in the water.

Reviews.Title: Small, sweet and power packed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Chandra"
Reviews.Content: Its got all the features that a regular point-n-shoot user needs. Gets sought of grainy in the dark but with high ISO settings, the quality of the images gets pretty good. Sometimes you feel you could have more than just 3X zoom and that the LCD could be larger, but with a 160 buck price tag, no complaints from my side. I compared the quality of images (including low light conditions) with SD880 and G9, and surprisingly the SD770 did pretty good! (And they were much much better than Nikon Coolpix S550). The size, although small, might not be very convenient to take pictures sometimes (Need to get used to it). Overall, 5 *'s from me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Pam K "Cincy Grandma"
Reviews.Content: I have the SD 800 and my son and daughter-in-law loved the pictures I took. I got them the 770 and I think the pictures are even better than on my 800. This was their favorite gift.

Reviews.Title: Tiny package, unbelievable quality
Reviews.Author: Kateyras
Reviews.Content: It is almost unbelievable the quality of this camera for this price.  And the pictures it takes are gorgeous.  If you want to enjoy your family outings, sightseeing or birdwatching without having to drag around a big bulky heavy camera, yet want great - GREAT - pictures, get one of these cameras.  Awesome quality for the price and convenience.

Reviews.Title: my favorite digital camera yet
Reviews.Author: OnlineShopper524
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this Canon for my own use and printed pictures out for Christmas...the pictures turned out clear, crisp and the bect quality that I've seen in any of my previous digital cameras. The screen in large enough to share and the camera is compact enough that I carry it in my purse so it's with me at all times. I have been able to crop, change the color etc. all on the camera without needing a computer editing program. I recommend this camera to anyone, it's very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Natalie Patterson
Reviews.Content: This camera is an absolute must buy.  I am 100% satisfied with this purchase.  (Which is very rare for me)

Reviews.Title: Gotta love Canon
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a birthday present. Not only did I love it, but they loved it.You cant go wrong with a canon.I highly recommend this camera to anyone in search of one.

Reviews.Title: lights camera action
Reviews.Author: Gary McKay "the shadow knows"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for a couple of weeks and taken a few pictures.  All have turned out very well.  Like most new electronic devices this has more preprogramed options in it than I will ever use.  It will take a while to learn how to activate the few modes I will want to use.  Other than that I am very satisfied with the picture quality.  It is almost idiot proof.

Reviews.Title: YOU CAN'T BUY MORE FOR LESS THAN THE SD770
Reviews.Author: Tjomsland "Common-Sense, Wit & Wisdom"
Reviews.Content: The Canon SD770IS does probably more than I will ever need, but just in case, the SD770, will do everything and more.  I don't know how Canon can put so much in a camera that is this small.  I had a SD20 Canon for years that was a wonderful camera.  But, it was time to move on and up.  I always carried my SD20 in my pocket and so does the SD770.  I bought a Case Logic neoprene case which is perfect.  You don't even know the camera is in your pocket.  I did upgrade to a 4GB memory card.  And, I made the mistake of spending the money  for the Canon Case.  It took me about 48 hours to order the Case Logic Case.  But, that is another story.  I love this camera.  The usable features are endless and the photos are great.  I spent a lot of time and read a lot of reviews before deciding to buy this.  Thanks to Julie Neal from Disneyworld.  She pushed me over the top.  And, I am so glad I read her review.  Incidentally, I sold my SD20 to a gentleman who's SD10 had finally gave up the ghost.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Owen
Reviews.Content: I have a large Nikon D-SLR and wanted a small quality camera that would fit in a pocket. The Canon SD770 fits the bill; takes crisp shots with great color quality, has a decent zoom lens, has optical image stabilization, has a bigger LCD, and is quick and easy to use. The battery is rechargeable and long-lasting. Photos download quickly on my computer just using the Win XP camera wizard (I don't use Canon's software). Close-ups of photos do sometimes show "noise", but that's to be expected with a small camera. At work, we have an earlier PowerShot model - the controls and settings are much improved on this model, easier and more intuitive. This is an excellent point and shoot camera -- I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Solid upgrade from SD600
Reviews.Author: J. Rice
Reviews.Content: I saw this at a fantastic price on Amazon and decided to upgrade my well-loved SD600 that has served me well for several years. This is a great successor to that model in my opinion. It has improved software and optical sensors (such as 10MP and image stabilization), while keeping the form-factor and style that I love.My only complaint is that it uses a newer model of battery, so I can't continue to use my backups. I recognize this is in service of a longer battery life, so it was probably inevitable.

Reviews.Title: Just a great camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Aguilar "Paul Aguilar"
Reviews.Content: Ive owned and still have several Canon cameras G9, G2, G3,G5,G6, SD700IS, SD1000, SD1100 and this beauty the SD770IS. I hang on to them for a while then give them to my children and grandchildren & then replace them because I really enjoy them.The 770IS is not a G9 but I will tell you its close. The 770IS is a wonderful peice of equipment, a casual camera user might not use all the advantages this camera has to offer, so READ THE MANUAL its all there and easy to understand. I wish Nikon could write manuals the way Canon does, I have a few Nikon SLRs and the manuals are daunting. Love the photo results from Nikon SLRs hate the manuals.You cant go wrong with this camera and buying from Amazon is a breeze, not to mention the price is most times the best price.

Reviews.Title: Canon 770 IS, exactly as ordered
Reviews.Author: Dana Robert Ross
Reviews.Content: For anyone thinking about ordering this camera, it is amazing what they have put into such a small package. Included in the deal was a 4 gig sd card. All products were as advertised, and the free delivery came a day earlier than promised.There seems to be a lot of choices to pick from when using the menu, and that might take awhile for me, my attention span is shorter than a puppy.As of this moment, I am really glad I ordered this camera and glad I ordered it from Amazon. The best price, great service, and quick and free delivery.

Reviews.Title: must have!!!!
Reviews.Author: shopgirl
Reviews.Content: the most amazing camera ive ever owned! it takes the most spectacular pictures and its so small! I always get compliments on the picture quality and my sister who is a professional photographer recommended it to me. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Israel Colon, PhD
Reviews.Content: I had a Nikon Coolpix and what a step up this is.  I have not been disappointed and especially impressed with the battery life which for the Nikon was non-existent.

Reviews.Title: too much tiny print (directions!); not user friendly
Reviews.Author: J. Seider
Reviews.Content: This review could change once I get past the tiny print in the mammouth directions guide...tho I was warned by other reviewers that this camera is not user friendly. Any hints from other happier users are welcome! Plus, after taking 2 pixs, the camera "said" the memory card was full! was this an error? is original card w/camera. BTW, am a senior citizen not that technologically estute...purchaser beware.

Reviews.Title: Small Camera Will Travel and VIDEO.
Reviews.Author: Duckey Wuckey "Duckey Wuckey"
Reviews.Content: I needed a small lightweight camera to carry places in my pocket and in a small dry spot on my boat. This camera fits the bill without being relatively expensive.  I am pleased with the small size and the pictures look good as was expected. However, I received a benefit I was not anticipating in the video performance. At no zoom the video quality (in my opinion) is equal or very close to the quality of my sony digital 8 camcorders and even my canon mini dvd camcorder. The video quality deteriorates rapidly after 2x magnification and I would recommend no one using 3.5 x magnification on video. That being said, I then purchased some 8gb and 16gb sd cards and I am a very happy guy (8gb just over 1 hour video length and 16gb 2+ hours video). I used this christmas eve and the next day took out the sd card and transferred the files to harddrive and opened windows vita home premium movie maker and dropped them into it and made a quick title and added some pictures (with this camera also) to the storyline with the video clips and chose to make a dvd and 45 minutes later I took my dvd over to the inlaws and relatives to enjoy watching on christmas day. It looked very impressive playing thru their dvd player upon the 50 inch lcd tv. I am now of the opinion that I will seldom use my other camcorders unless my subject is far away and zooming becomes necessary. It was much faster dropping the sd card into the harddrive vs. hooking up the 1394 cable. Give it a try without using the zoom and I think you too will be impressed.......Just as a side note I want to let people know who video that I am extremely unhappy with my 2 sony digital 8 camcorders no longer being recognized by plug & play when using 1394 firewire to windows xp & Vista home premium. I contacted sony and told them they both worked 3 months ago but not now, so is it new drivers being updated by MSFT??? They said they could not help, check with msft. I called msft and the guy said it's up to sony. A very frustrating experience and all I know is they both worked 3 months ago with plug & play and neither digital 8 work now and my computer has had a "ton" of msft updates hit it. Oh well, the canon mini dvd still works with the 1394 firewire on both xp & vista. I hope I don't download an update today and have that function vanish also (I'm quickly getting as many of my old vhs/digital 8 tapes/ and mini-dvd tapes put on a hard drive ASAP. What's the moral of the story---Many choices. Hopefully the sd card will not be replaced and outdated in the next 5 years by big companies.

Reviews.Title: An alright camera
Reviews.Author: ambYtious "Love is all we need :)"
Reviews.Content: The pictures are clear in that you can see every detail but I like taking pictures in my house and for some reason every picture I take in my house with this camera is blurry.  Actually almost every picture I take anywhere is blurry or dark.  It's very small, I am sure I will be able to carry it in my purse all the time with no extra weight.  I love that it's so easy to use, right out of the box you can start snapping shots.  I don't like that you have to have a memory card in to use it, but with any camera you eventually will need a memory card so that's OK.  Another thing I really don't like is that you have to hold down the button for at least three seconds then let go, before it will take the shot.  Three seconds is not a long time but it seems like forever and people usually change their facial expression so you end up not capturing the moment.  There are a lot more things that I don't like about this camera than my old Sony DSC camera so I've only used it a couple of times and find myself not even wanting to take pictures because I know the quality is not going to be what I'm used to.  With that said, I'll probably be buying another Sony.  Eventually I am going to invest in a DSLR because these regular digital cameras just don't have enough greatness for me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: culturevulture
Reviews.Content: Lovely picture quality, very easy to use (much easier than my prior Canon), and so quick to start. Easy to carry as well - can't wait to really put it through its paces.

Reviews.Title: Lens error
Reviews.Author: Skater
Reviews.Content: We got the dreaded lens error on a trip and we we were not very happy.  The camera is now dead and the repair bill is too high to repair.  We will not be buying a similar camera.  Canon will not stand behind their cameras.

Reviews.Title: Quality control problem
Reviews.Author: Christian Homemaker
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera but not a great camera.  I was hoping for better quality than my last camera but after owning the Photshot SD770 IS camera for only 8 months the battery door broke off.  The hinge cracked because it is made of plastic.  My choices were to pay to ship it back to Cannon for repair and be without my camera for several weeks or to order the $13.00 part and install it myself.  I opted to order the part as it "should" be easy to install and I won't be without my camera for several weeks.Overall the camera is a good camera.  It is not too difficult to operate but there are settings that I haven't begun to explore.  The picture quality is good.  I am sure it could be better if I learned how to use some of the more advanced settings, but for my home use it is good enough.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Mueller
Reviews.Content: It's a great little camera for the money. I'm very impressed with the picture quality of both snapshots and video. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Canon is the best
Reviews.Author: Joshua Babbitt
Reviews.Content: As usual, Canon makes a great camera at a great price.  This camera is easy to use and has way more features than I could ever hope to use.  The instruction manual alone is a few hundred pages, which is daunting when all you want is a simple point-and-shoot camera, but the beauty of this is that it works as a simple camera and yet does almost anything you can ask for.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: retired photographer
Reviews.Author: thom sea "t the c"
Reviews.Content: Compact, lightweight but lots of hi-res picture power and it was cheap as it sits next to my $1200. and over Nikons.

Reviews.Title: Another step upward for Canon
Reviews.Author: Kirby Q. Ashburn
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Canon Powershot and every upgrade has had more pleasant surprises.  It's the king of the compact digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Ross
Reviews.Content: A professional may find fault in this camera, but I can't. A lot of research led me to the canon, but I was sceptical if a camera that small could take good pictures. Well, the pictures were great! I also found it had a few less "scene" settings than my old Nikon, but the Auto setting on the canon is so good that I rarely need to find a different setting. My old camera had re-chargeable AA's and I am so glad I bought one with the Lithium Ion. Amazon's great price plus Great pictures equals a great camera for me. I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: SD770IS
Reviews.Author: J. Quigley
Reviews.Content: Canon Powershot SD770 IS 10MP Digital Camera with 3X Optical Image Stabilized Zoom was an excelent buy at $157.The shots are clear and concise and the Stabilized Zoom is what I bought the camera for.It meets all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Canon's always good
Reviews.Author: K. Gordon
Reviews.Content: This is my second Canon camera.  I love Canon's because they take great shots and you don't have to be a rocket scientist to figure out how to use them.  This one is no exception.  Small enough to take anywhere but its packed with the features you need.

Reviews.Title: nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: P. Yang
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this camera long enough to know every little details of it, but so far it looks like a great camera. The pictures come out great, the colors are much better than a Sony camera I used to have. The auto mode takes great photos by itself, and you can also tweak the settings (in different manual modes) and do some interesting stuff with it. The functions and features are easy to use. Battery life is also very good, and small enough to fit easily in your pocket so you can take it anywhere you want. This probably isn't the best camera out there, but an extremely good camera for someone who just needs to take simple photos with family/friends and stuff, especially for this price.

Reviews.Title: Great features and easy to use
Reviews.Author: M. Presto
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife as a first time user of a digital camera.  Basic functions are easy to use unlike some cameras that require paging through a menu to operate.  Takes excellent pictures.  Particularly like the face recognition feature and LCD screen.Amazon billed me $10 more than the confirmed price because the deal price increased between the time I ordered and it shipped.  They refunded the difference after I contacted them, but the error should not have occured to begin with.  And - although the price when up at the time of the shippment, by the time I reviewed the credit card statement, the price was reduced by $20.  Please note that Amazon no longer offers a 30 day price guaranty.

Reviews.Title: I love this little camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. J-S
Reviews.Content: It was time to buy a new digital camera. After reading many reviews I settled on this one and I am very happy with it.It was a bit smaller than I had anticipated (my fault for not reading about the size more carefully).  I now like the way I can just store it in my pocket, purse or bag and I find that I am taking it more places because of its size and convenience.It is easy to use and takes great pics of pets, landscapes and people.  The viewing window is very tiny so I find I take most of my pics by using the back display.  It is a big and bright display so it is now my preference (although I thought for sure I would prefer the window when I first decided to buy it).  Battery life seems good so far.I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Pictures When Flash Activated!
Reviews.Author: Marlene Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Quite by accident - just playing around with my new camera - I realized that when the flash is activated and you have it set on AUTO, you can't get a blurry picture!  I've sat here spinning the camera around while taking picture after picture and every picture is clear and Not blurry at all.  This is amazing to me. I've never had this with any camera in the past.  I look forward to trying action shots to see how that will work, although most action shots, at least indoors,  aren't in a situation where you can use a flash.

Reviews.Title: Good mobile camera
Reviews.Author: NiK
Reviews.Content: positives:it's a great mobile camera, easy to carry, zoom is OK, easy to use and make settings.negatives:Though it says it has image stabilization, the pictures will have chromatic abberation or distortion if the camera is shaken while taking pictures.If the pictures are taken properly without shaking the camera, its a great one for a great price

Reviews.Title: a pretty decent camera for 150dollars
Reviews.Author: Sriram Nallamothu "rmckev"
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot SD770 IS 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Silver)  a very good camera for a prince range of around 150dollars , pictures are good 2.5inch lcd is good battery life is oka decent pocket size camera .but i would prefer a 10mp cam with a good optical zoom like  cannon sd890 and it has a nice 5x optical zoom shape of the camera is nice .

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sam "Gizmo Fan"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. I have always been a Canon fan ever since someone told me that they have the best image processing chips and I haven't found a reason to complain. These cameras are a bit delicate though and dropping one can be catastrophic. Not too many advanced features/manual overrides in this one, but the auto shots are really good. The optical viewfinder is very handy in bright sunlight where the LCD can be a bit washed out. Optical image stabilization is a great help. You can zoom while taking videos which was not possible with my earlier S50 though that one had a lot of manual override features. Highly recommend this camera for those looking for a quick point & shoot which can take great shots.

Reviews.Title: Bad Zoom button
Reviews.Author: Deven Bharat Sagar
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my girl friend as a gift. The camera arrived just as promised, but when I took it out in weather conditions around 33 degrees farenheit. The zoom button got jammed and I would have to struggle with it to get it to zoom.I was so disappointed since I had to buy her another camera before she left. So much for a well-planned gift.I thought these simple things would be taken care of with cameras by canon(Apparently not!)

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture quality and such a great deal!
Reviews.Author: A. Knecht
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera! The image stabilization works wonders, and I am even able to get a clear image in low light without the flash on. I am really impressed with the quality of my images in a dark restaurant. The color comes out looking vibrant, people's faces aren't washed out, and this is hands down the best digital camera I've owned yet.The closeup feature is amazing too. Closeups come out crystal clear, and the color is perfect. You have to know a little about camera functions to get a truly amazing image in close up, but after a few tries it comes out great. I also love using the camera for landscape images. My old Olympus required me to change settings to take good landscape images, but not with this camera. You just remove the flash and go.I really love how you don't have to mess with a million buttons to take a good image with this camera. That's why I give this camera 5 stars, for easy use combined with quality photos.Great camera, at an amazing price ANYONE can take good picture with.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: cmk1523
Reviews.Content: No problems. Just as advertised. Its very small. A couple test pics in medium light was a little grainy when viewing the picture at full resolution, so I'm not sure whats going on there. I tried to take a picture while moving the camera, and sure enought it still takes blurry photos which I assumed was a thing of the past is the "IS" technology.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Andrew "amazoner"
Reviews.Content: My Kodak CX7430 ate two AA batterys for every 10 shot and my Samsung MiniDV stoped working after three years.So I bought this SD770IS to replace the old two,and it exceeds my expectations.The battery seems to last forever, I have taken maybe over 200 pictures and altogether 1 hour video, all indoor, sometimes with flash, and the low battery warning didn't show up until today.The video is just great, much better quality than a video camera.The two things I don't like: the video takes up more than 100M for every 1 minite, and the red eye light is very annoying and doesn't seem to work.

Reviews.Title: Great camera. Canon continues to improve a classic
Reviews.Author: Kudah
Reviews.Content: After my 3 year old Canon point and shoot finally croaked, I shopped around and ended up buying this one.
